name: YouMinter
description: YouMinter is an easy-to-use iOS and Android app with a feed, followers, and likes which opens up the world of NFT to everyone. Users can create, mint, and share their NFTs on any blockchain with just a few taps. We make it accessible to a non-crypto audience, and as easy to use as possible. Unlike other projects, we offer a kind of social network for artists and admirers of NFT. Users can create NFTs in the built-in editor, publish them and set a price, as well as build themed collections within the app. YouMinter is a balanced tool that unites creativity and its connoisseurs: - Artists can create communities and promote their masterpieces. - Fans can customize their feed and follow their favorite artists. - Collectors can create and manage their collections. All of these features are available to every user, and there is no need to use any crypto-wallets or external services.
